Text: You're positive all of them work and don't install then say they're not installed after launching the game?
Genial. Los archivos .sims3pack hay que decaprify para que funcionen.

After hearing your issues with sims3packs, I've done some research and testing.  What I have come to find out is that The Sims 3 Launcher can only install so many sims3packs.  I think it is a glitch with the game, however, there is a certain point where you install sims 3 packs, load the game, open the launcher, and not all of them are installed.  It's a pain in the butt.  But what I have found is that it is easier to load the store items as package files and load the worlds as sims3packs.  I hope this helps.

I have released a newer torrent which includes sims3packs and package files, and I have also included the India Inspirations Collection for April.  It also contains some pretty neat mods for the game if you wish to use them.  Check it out.  http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7227228/Sims_3_Store_Full_June_2009_-_April_2012_Sims3Packs___Packages__#filelistContainer
